'''Gergely Nagy''' ([[6 March|March 6]], [[1969]]) is a Junior Assistant Professor at the Institute of English and American Studies at the [[wikipedia:University of Szeged|University of Szeged]]. He has taught courses on Tolkien and Plato (and the connections between the two), and is also a founding member and the academic vice president of the [[Hungarian Tolkien Society]].
